name: YouTube Minimalizer
description: Removes quite a bit of YouTube clutter. Not pretty bit it works.
additional_info: I will leave this up but I had better luck with Adblockplus so I may not update this anymore unless I can figure out a way to kill #gh-activityfeed without killing search results. As it is right now that big div takes up the main page and is required to load search results. pretty ugly ;\

discussions.name: Buddha gives it a thunderous single hand applause!
